title: The Gate
visuals: ASCII_Overlay: High contrast shadows. The 'Hazers' are rendered as silhouettes with glowing asterisks '*' for gas mask eyes.
narrative:
The Oakhaven gate looms ahead. 'Bio-Hazard' signs are spray-painted over with the words 'BIO-DYNE KILLS'.

Guards in heavy rain gear patrol the top. Jax pulls you into the shadows violently.
'No contact,' he hisses. 'We don't talk to them. I know a vent around back.'
gmNotes: Jax knows this place too well. He's been here before - 15 years ago, when he traded the vent codes.
lighting: Moonlight filtered through toxic haze. Searchlights sweep the perimeter.
audio: Wind through chain-link, distant coughing, the creak of rusted metal.

npcs.name: Jaxson 'Jax' V.
npcs.notes: Nervous. Knows the layout suspiciously well.
npcs.motivation: Get inside without being seen. He can't let the Hazers recognize him.
npcs.personality: Twitchy, whispering, constantly checking over his shoulder.

npcs.name: Hazer Guards (x2)
npcs.notes: Patrolling the gate. Will attack if spotted.
npcs.motivation: Keep outsiders away from the shrine and the sleepers.
npcs.personality: Vigilant but exhausted. They cough frequently.

challenges.description: Bypass the rusted vent fan to enter Oakhaven undetected.

success_effect.text: You bypass the rusted fan. You slide into the tunnel. Above you, you hear the guards praying to 'keep the air seals tight'.

failure_effect.text: The grate screeches. You tumble in, taking 1 Stress. The guards are alerted.

challenges.description: Move silently past the Hazer patrol.

success_effect.text: You slip through the shadows like a ghost. The guards never see you.

failure_effect.text: A guard spots movement. 'Intruders!' The alarm is raised.

triggers.label: Jax's Familiarity
triggers.text: Jax navigates the perimeter without hesitation. He knows exactly where the blind spots are. How?
